ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains EISCAT common program CP1 auto-correlation functions (ACF) from the Sodankyla remote site.

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Antenna Azimuth
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Azimuth (0, North)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Antenna Elevation
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Elevation (90, Vertical)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Half Scattering Angle
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Single Value Parameters - Values: Half Scattering Angle (0, 90째)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Transmit Peak Power
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Single Value Parameters - Values: Transmit Peak Power

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Number of Sample Summed
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Number of Sample Summed - Increment
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed - Increment

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla System Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Single Value Parameters - Values: System Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Line Of Sight Velocity
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Primary Parameter Line Of Sight Velocity (for monostatic radar) or velocity along the Transmit/Receive direction bisector

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Line Of Sight Velocity Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Primary Parameter Line Of Sight Velocity Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Doppler Frequency Measured
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Primary Parameter Doppler Frequency Measured

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Decimal Logarithm of the Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Electron Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Primary Parameter Electron Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Ion Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Primary Parameter Ion Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Ion Temperature Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Primary Parameter Ion Temperature Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Additional Parameter Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Additional Parameter Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Additional Parameter O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Additional Parameter O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Additional Parameter H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Additional Parameter H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Decimal Logarithm of the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Additional Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled value

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Sodankyla Additional Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled value
